original_title: Sri Yantra: The Oregon Desert Mystery
overview: Who or what created the massive design discovered in the Oregon desert? After 27 years, recently discovered video footage reveals the origin of the massive design created in the Oregon desert in 1990. Never-before-seen footage, interviews from 1990 and today, news reports, and scientific and speculative analysis are combined to tell this true story of adventure, ingenuity and spirituality.
title: Sri Yantra: The Oregon Desert Mystery
